findings.title: add function design flaws
findings.description: The HuckleberryFarm contract uses balanceOf to obtain the user's staking when the reward is calculated, so the user may lose principal when the reward tokens and staking tokens are the same.

findings.title: Deflationary Bonus Token
findings.description: The reward token finn in the HuckleberryFarm contract is a deflationary bonus token and pre-populated into this contract, which may cause uncollected rewards after allEndTime if not set as a bonus exception address.

findings.title: Two Types of Problems with This Type of Staking Pool
findings.description: There are two types of problems with this type of staking pool: first, there is no special treatment for inflation-deflation type tokens, and there is no check to see if the actual number of tokens transferred to the contract is the same as the number filled in when the function is called; second, the reward tokens are added as staking tokens, resulting in an exception in the reward calculation.
